revised_title: Spectroscopic Investigation of the Xanthophyll Group of Yellow Colouring Matters
tldr: The author investigates the xanthophyll group of yellow colouring matters found in flowers, leaves, and fruits. Through spectroscopic observations, the author distinguishes three distinct yellow colouring matters and discusses their characteristics, absorption bands, and chemical properties. The study provides insights into the relationship between these colouring matters and their potential role in the depth of colour in flowers.
